description: Imports data from an Oracle Database and returns the results as a datatable.

input.name: connectionString
input.description:
An Easy Connect string (e.g. hostname:port/service), a Connect Descriptor string, or the SID of a local Oracle Database instance.
If unspecified, defaults to `localhost:1521/XEPDB1`.

input.name: username
input.description: The username to connect to the database.

input.name: password
input.description: The password to connect to the database.

input.name: query
input.description: The SQL query reading from the database (e.g. `SELECT * from table WHERE ...`).

output.name: data
output.description: A datatable containing the imported data.
